data.message: The American people subject to the rule of Masonic tight and their goal is Americanize the world or build a common one government ... but the only obstacle they face are Muslims because of their beliefs ... so starting Masons publish their culture throughout the Arab and Islamic media did not succeed ... then they had financed some of the elements weak in religious belief in order to do the problems in Islamic countries have his Islamic terrorism ... They did all this in order to find an argument for intervention and the killing and bloodshed in Muslim countries .... and there are other and the fact is that the Bladen but it is not a terrorist extremist to defend his country and take out the US occupation of his homeland
